title: Revive being removed?
body: So, according to Surrender at 20, Revive is currently removed on the PBE and I'm curious to what people think about this. Thoughts?

replies.body: how am i supposed to play karthus without it.
RIP zombie karthus you will be missed.
While the spell has its uses, it is generally used by people who are trolling. I am not happy or sad of its removal.
Karthus and Hecarim are the only 2 champions I could ever really see it being possibly viable on. Most people take it to troll a lot of the time.
